== Possible plugins ==

* track what invited code was used to join a discord:
  * this should give limited cred
  * should include an exclusion list of users and/or hashtags to reduce ill-intentioned farming
  * https://discord.com/developers/docs/resources/audit-log
* on twitter, check likes/retweets under certain hashtags and/or users:
  * this should give limited cred
  * should include an exclusion list of users and/or hashtags to reduce ill-intentioned farming
